dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5262 IH: To redesignate the Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area as the Maurice D. Hinchey Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York (for himself and Mr. King of New York) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate the Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area as the Maurice D. Hinchey Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.

subsection.text: The Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 (16 U.S.C. 461 note; Public Law 104â€“333) is amended by striking Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area each place it appears and inserting Maurice D. Hinchey Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the Heritage Area referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Maurice D. Hinchey Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area.
